name: Fluffy Bound
description:
Fluffy Bound is a game where you play as poorly made toy at Santa's toy factory. Your objective is to escape the toy factory to not be discarded as garbage.  

Each animal has it's own ability, use them wisely to finish all the levels.

Keyboard controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • ESC - Pause
  • 1-6/Q-E - Change character

Third Party Attributions: Suzanne (Monkey Head Mesh) exported from Blender
